result.execSummary:
The defendant Javier E McCants was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: REQUEST TO ISSUE CIVIL JUDGMENT FOR RESTITUTION RECEIVED AND FORWARDED TO ALI. OS

Defendant Javier E McCants in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Defendant Javier E McCants in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM 
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Additional statements by: Calvester T.
As to count 1:
Defendant sentenced to serve 9 Months in the House of Correction, concurrent to any other sentence, with credit for 92 days time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 2 years.

As to count 2:
Defendant sentenced to serve 3 Months in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 0 days time served.  COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 2 years.


Conditions of Probation/ Extended Supervision if revoked:
- 30 days condition time with Huber for work.
- AODA assessment and cooperate with any programs deemed necessary by the probation department.
- Absolute/maintain sobriety, no alcohol, no drugs.
- No contact with: nattalie J., Calvester T., Daasia N., Kayla N., J.S. Dob 07/10/03, A.M. Dob 07/10/03.
- Provide a DNA sample.
  No weapons or any firearms.
  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription
  No violent Contact within the community 
- Follow all rules of supervision and follow through with any other treatment deemed necessary by the department.
Restitution in the amount of $1009.83 to Nattalie J; 
All court costs, fees, and surcharges (including DNA) and restitution due by 04/25/2017; or civil judgment
All applicable fees of supervision.
-  Cash bail on deposit to be applied. 

Filed:  

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Pre-trial Incarceration Credit
Letters from defense

Defendant Javier E McCants in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Defendant Javier E McCants in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
As to Counts 1 and 2:
Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  As to Count 2 court order the penalty enchancer dismissed.  Court order Jury Trial date of 04-25-16 vacated. Case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 31.  Sentence Hearing schedule for April 25, 2016 at 8:30am.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court, defendant Javier E McCants not in court, in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LM  
Case in court for final pre-trial.  Defense request more time for reasons stated on the record.  Jury trial is still schedule for 04-25-2016 at 9:00am.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 22, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court, defendant Javier E McCants not in court, in custody at House of Correction and not produced from bullpen.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defense counsel requests speedy trial. 

Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Speedy Jury Trial, Branch 31.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court, defendant Javier E McCants not in court, in custody and not produced.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel waived defendant's appearance for today's proceedings. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. 

Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.

  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  
Defendant to have no contact with: NATTALIE J., CALVESTER T. DAASIA N., KAYLA N., J.S. (7/10/03) AND A.M. (7/10/03).

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE POINT for Supervision.
Court orders defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY and to be monitored by drug testing.  
Court orders no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription. 
Court orders no possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.


Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.
